```{r}
asa_24_total %>% 
  dplyr::select(
    ses_comp_all,
    ses_subj1,
    ladd_comm,
    panas_neg,
    stai_trait,
    hese,
    KCAL:A_DRINKS
  ) %>% 
  filter_all(
    all_vars(!is.na(.))
  ) %>% 
  cor()
```

```{r}
# ASA 24 by day

asa_24_by_day <-
  asa_24_total %>% 
  dplyr::select(
    subid = ssdm2_subid,
    day = ReportingDate,
    KCAL:A_DRINKS
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    date = mdy(day)
  ) %>% 
  gather(food, amt, KCAL:A_DRINKS) %>% 
  group_by(subid, date, food) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean = mean(amt, na.rm = TRUE)
    #sd = sd(amt, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  spread(food, mean)

asa_24_avg <-
  asa_24_total %>% 
  dplyr::select(
    subid = ssdm2_subid,
    KCAL:A_DRINKS
  ) %>% 
  gather(food, amt, KCAL:A_DRINKS) %>% 
  group_by(subid, food) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean = mean(amt, na.rm = TRUE)
    #sd = sd(amt, na.rm = TRUE)
  )  %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  spread(food, mean)

asa_24_avg <-
  asa_24_avg %>% 
  mutate(subid = as.numeric(subid)) %>% 
  left_join(
    ssdm2_survey_data_nadm,
    by = "subid"
  )
```

```{r}
redcap_by_day <-
  redcap_ema %>% 
  dplyr::select(
    subid,
    ema_survey_timestamp,
    anger:motivated
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    date = date(ema_survey_timestamp),
    subid = as.numeric(subid)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-ema_survey_timestamp) %>% 
  gather(emotion, value, anger:motivated) %>% 
  group_by(subid, date, emotion) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean = mean(value, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  spread(emotion, mean)
```

## by day DF

```{r}
by_day <-
  redcap_by_day %>% 
  filter(!is.na(date)) %>% 
  left_join(
    asa_24_by_day,
    by = c("subid", "date")
  ) %>% 
  left_join(
    ssdm2_survey_data_nadm,
    by = "subid"
  )
```

##

```{r}
y_train <-
  finals_data %>% 
  select(finals) %>% 
  as.matrix()

my_grid <- 
  expand.grid(
    alpha = 0:1,
    lambda = seq(0.0001, 1, length = 20)
  )

set.seed(42)

rr_finals_fit1 <-
  train(
    x_train,
    y_train,
    # finals ~ .,
    # data = finals_data,
    method = "glmnet",
    preProc = c('scale','center'), 
    trControl = 
      trainControl(
        method = "cv", 
        number = 5
      ),
    tuneGrid = my_grid
  )

rr_finals_mod1 <- rr_finals_fit1$finalModel
```

```{r}
cal_stress <-
  asa_24_total %>% 
  group_by(redcap_record_id, RecallNo) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean_v = mean(V_TOTAL, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(day = RecallNo) %>% 
  left_join(
    redcap_ema %>% 
      group_by(redcap_record_id, day) %>% 
      summarise(
        mean_stress = mean(stress, na.rm = TRUE),
        mean_worried = mean(worried, na.rm = TRUE)
      ) %>% 
      mutate(
        day = as.integer(str_extract(day, "\\d"))
      ),
    by = c("redcap_record_id","day")
  )

summary(lmer(mean_v ~ mean_stress + (1|redcap_record_id), data = cal_stress))

summary(lmer(V_TOTAL ~ gen_eating_15 + (1|ssdm2_subid), data = asa_24_total))
```
